privacyPolicy.title:
B2S shop privacy policy and  terms and conditions
 (refund and cancellation)
privacyPolicy.description:
When you visit Book2Shine.com, we collect information about all 
visits to our website. We use it to improve your user experience and 
our marketing.

On this page you can read about:

• what information we collect
• how we process this information
• what we do with it
• who has access to it
• how you can contact us regarding the policy

The collection of information on Book2Shine.com takes place within 
the framework of the existing legislation. The personal data processed 
by Book2Shine.com takes place in accordance with current legislation 
and the EU's Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

Book2Shine.com automatically tracks IP address and data when you 
visit our website. Likewise, it is registered if and when you log in or
 subscribe. This is done to make your subsequent visits much easier.

In this context, we use various analysis tools such as Google Analytics, 
to collect statistics on how Book2Shine.com is used and to make your 
experience even better.
